name: Etched Sigil
flavorText: “When you gaze long into the arcane realm, the arcane realm also gazes into you.” - Zoltun Kulle
flavorTextHtml: “When you gaze long into the arcane realm, the arcane realm also gazes into you.” - Zoltun Kulle

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%

secondary.textHtml: While channeling Arcane Torrent, Disintegrate, or Ray of Frost, the damage of your Energy Twister is increased by 220%, and you also cast Energy Twister every second. [200 - 250]%
